2615 originating at Western Ave.

Train 2615 scheduled to arrive Fox Lake at 6:12 P.M. will originate and depart from Western Avenue due to train traffic being blocked between Chicago Union Station and Western Avenue. Please visit metra.com for any updates.

2715 delayed 15 to 25 minutes
Train #2715, scheduled to arrive Elgin at 5:45 P.M., may be operating 15 to 25 minutes behind schedule due to an Amrak derailment. Please visit metra.com for current delay information.

2715 Originating at Western Ave
Train 2715 will depart from Western Avenue due to train traffic being blocked between Chicago Union Station and Western Avenue. Please visit metra.com for any updates.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert ME - Homewood East Side Construction Will Begin March 13

Beginning Monday, March 13, access to the Homewood Station from the east will be closed for station construction until Summer 2024.  Access to the boarding platform will be through the Park Avenue entrance ONLY (west side of tracks).

 

Beginning, Monday, March 6, the Pace bus stop will relocate from Harwood Avenue to Park Avenue.  Please allow additional time and use caution near the work zone.

Metra Alert RI - Construction begins April 21 at 103rd Street Washington Heights Station.
Metra forces will begin work Friday, April 21 on a major rehab project at the 103rd Street/Washington Heights Station on the Rock Island Line, for more informaiton click here.

Metra Alert UP-NW - Midday weekend trains may operate up to 20 minutes behind schedule, track work
Midday weekend trains may operate up to 20 minutes behind schedule, track work.  Visit metra.com for current delay times.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=0
Metra Alert ME - Weekend trains may operate up to 15 minutes behind schedule, track work
Metra Electric weekend trains may operate up to 15 minutes behind schedule due to scheduled track work.  For additional information visit metra.com/constructionnotices.
metrarail.com/riding-metra/service-updates?Source=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&Email=1&Twitter=1
Metra Alert MD-N - Milwaukee North and West trains will arrive and originate from Western Ave until further notice - Amtrak Derailment

Due to an Amtrak derailment, Milwaukee North and West trains can't enter or depart Chicago Union station. Trains will arrive and originate from Weatern Ave until further notice. For alternate travel information as well as travel information from Western Ave to downtown Chicago, please contact RTA at 312-836-7000. Please listen to platform anouncements for delay times and the location of your train. Metra will provide updated information as it becomes available.

Metra Alert MD-W - Milwaukee North and West trains will arrive and originate from Western Ave until further notice - Amtrak Derailment

Due to an Amtrak derailment, Milwaukee North and West trains can't enter or depart Chicago Union station. Trains will arrive and originate from Western Ave until further notice. For alternate travel information as well as travel information from Western Ave to downtown Chicago, please contact RTA at 312-836-7000. Please listen to platform anouncements for delay times and the location of your train. Metra will provide updated information as it becomes available.
